Key Arguments: The proposed legislation threatens freedom of speech and opinion.
The government should not be the arbiter of truth or censor dissenting opinions.
Open and honest debate is the solution to misinformation, not government intervention.
The bill represents government overreach and a step towards authoritarianism.
Notable Quotes: The solution is open and honest debate.
This bill represents complete government overreach.
That is not the Australia we want to pass on to the next generation.
